content.description: Wander up the steepest part of the canyon's north-facing side....it feels a lot like moving 300 or so boxes of research around your house, as well as stacking 2,000-odd books to get them ready for shipping to Australia. Climb it and try to free yourself of such burdens....
content.protection: 4 bolts to a two bolt anchor. The two bolt hangers can be rapped off.

content.description: This tiny area is behind my parents old home on Baranca Mesa, in the small canyon east of the Guaje Pines cemetery. There is only one short sport climb there at the moment (for obvious reasons), but there are a couple more possibilities.
